name: Monkey.D.Luffy
effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: If you have 0 or 3 or more DON!! cards on your field, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: Uso-Hachi
effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

name: O-Robi
effect: [On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

name: Jinbe
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[Opponent's Turn] If you have 10 DON!! cards on your field, this Character gains +1000 power.

name: Zoro-Juurou
effect: [When Attacking] If you have 3 or less Life cards, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

name: Chopa-Emon
effect: [On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, set up to 1 of your purple {Straw Hat Crew} type Characters with 6000 power or less as active.

name: Fra-Nosuke
effect:
[DON!! x1] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, this Character gains [Rush].
(This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

name: Hone-Kichi
effect: [On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, give up to 2 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.

name: When You're at Sea You Fight against Pirates!!
effect: [Main] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew}, {Kid Pirates}, or {Heart Pirates} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Uso-Hachi
effect: [On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

name: O-Nami
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Play] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, trash 1 card from your hand and draw 2 cards.

name: San-Gorou
effect: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, draw 1 card.

name: Zoro-Juurou
effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 purple {Straw Hat Crew} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Luffy-Tarou
effect: [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Play up to 1 purple {Straw Hat Crew} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.
